1.0.name: wordpress/eatables
1.0.description: This plugin allows you to share your favourite recipes from eat.abl.es direct in your sidebar. Eatables is a community generate recipe site, where you can add, share and rate recipes with your friends. Opt to show your favourite recipes, recipes you've added or the top featured recipes from the site.
